item.title: 1.0.0-incubating (Espressivo) released
item.description: After 7 months of work the Apache Syncope team is proud to announce the final release of the first stable version since entering the Apache Incubator.

item.title: 1.0.0-RC3-incubating (Espressivo) released
item.description: The Apache Syncope team is pleased to announce the release of Syncope 1.0.0-RC3-incubating

item.title: New support site available
item.description: Looking for enterprise support information about Apache Syncope?

item.title: Syncope IdM enters the Apache Incubator
item.description: Today Syncope IdM has been officially accepted at the Apache Incubator.

item.title: Syncope 0.7.1 (Ritornello) released
item.description: A maintenance release 0.7.1 for Ritornello is available.

item.title: Syncope 0.7 (Ritornello) released
item.description: With great pleasure and pride we announce the availability of the new 0.7 Ritornello, released on schedule (check it on the roadmap).

item.title: Syncope 0.7RC2 (Ritornello) released
item.description: Time for second release candidate for Ritornello; as planned, no new features have been added, only bugs fixed.

item.title: Active Directory JNDI connector goes 1.0
item.description: ConnId team has just released their connector bundle for Active Directory (JNDI implementation), version 1.0.

item.title: Syncope 0.7RC1 (Ritornello) released
item.description: After five months of heavy development, Syncope 0.7 Ritornello reaches its first release candidate.

item.title: Blog Post: Big mess solved, at last
item.description: Syncope and ConnId in place in order to solve issues generated by bad usage of Active Directory

item.title: Continuous Integration available
item.description: Since yesterday, August 31st 2011, a continuous integration (CI) system is available for Syncope and ConnId builds at http://jenkins.syncope-idm.org.

item.title: Syncope 0.6 Sostenuto released
item.description: With great pleasure and pride we announce the availability of the new 0.6 Syncope rolling release Sostenuto.

item.title: Syncope 0.5.2 (Crescendo) released
item.description: A new maintenance release of Syncope Crescendo, 0.5.2, is available.

item.title: Syncope 0.5.1 (Crescendo) released
item.description: With great pleasure and pride we announce the availability of the new 0.5.1 Syncope release, Crescendo.
